adv.js: { const id_params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"); let datas = await db.m_academic_year.findMany({ where: { id: Number(id_params), }, }); local.name = datas[0].name; local.startDate = new Date(datas[0].start_time); local.endDate = new Date(datas[0].end_time); console.log(datas, "data"); local.render(); }} > {children}

action_function.valueBuilt: async()=>{let a=!1;new Date>=new Date(local.startDate)&&new Date<=new Date(local.endDate)&&(a=!0),confirm("Are you sure to update this data?")&&(await db.m_academic_year.update({where:{id:Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"))},data:{name:local.name,start_time:local.startDate,end_time:local.endDate,updated_by:user.id,updated_date:new Date,is_active:a}}),navigate("/institution/data/academic-years"))};

async()=>{confirm("Are you sure to delete data?")?(await db.m_academic_year.delete({where:{id:Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"))}}),local.render(),navigate("/institution/data/academic-years")):local.render()};
